about_the_game:
VRM Dance Dream MV is a sophisticated music video creation tool designed specifically for VRM avatars. Create commercially usable videos with ease by freely combining avatars, dances, music, stages, and effects!

Perfect for users who:

  • Want to create professional-quality MVs in a short time

  • Wish to make VRoid and VRM models dance effortlessly

  • Need to check model movement integrity

  • Find MMD operations challenging

Easy Setup! Create your unique MV by simply selecting five elements: avatar, dance, music, stage, and effects! Let the tool handle all the complex camera work for you!

Key Features:

  • Model Data: VRM and VRoid Hub compatible (VRM1.0 supported)

  • Motion Data: Compatible with BVH, FBX, VMD, VRMA

  • Music Data: Supports MP3, WAV

  • Stage Data: GLB compatible

  • MMD Camera Work: VMD import supported

  • Additional Features: Automatic camera work, post-effects, MP4 video export

Create your own unique MVs with endless combinations! Start your creative journey now!
